redistribute it 1 | urederra socks sizes in this design you will find 3 sizes to choose from they will appear as 1 2 3 and are equivalent to a foot circumference of 17 5 20 22 5 cm / 7 8 8 5 inches size 1 are written for 56 sts size 2 for 64 sts and size 3 for 72 sts materials for this design i used 2 skeins of regia 4-fädig 4 ply color 1061 it s a sock fingering weight yarn each skein has 50 grams and 210 metres/1 75 oz and 230 yds 75% virgin wool 25% polyamide for size 2 and foot 39 i used 71 grams total the equivalent is a 100 grams and 400 metres skein of fingering weight yarn designed for socks other recommended yarns  malabrigo socks  drops fabel  katia united socks  drops nord tools  2 5 mm us 1½ needle or size needed to obtain gauge this pattern is written for circular needles with a 80 cm / 30 inches cable using the magic loop technique but it can be adapted to  5 double pointed needles dpns  tiny circular needles with a 23 cm / 9 inches cable if you use this you will also need dpns or a long circular needle to work the toes  1 border marker bm  2 extra markers  tapestry needle  tape measure  scissors  row counter optional but recommended  sock blockers optional but recommended for a perfect finish once blocked gauge 32 sts and 43 rounds to 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches measured in stockinette stitch using 2 5 mm us 1½ needles special techniques  magic
